topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54effec1636872591fe23e00#post_54effec1636872591fe23e00
I don't care about kesha one way or the other _but dat animation tho_
Like, it's not crazy high budget studio quality animation but at the same time it's super good for just a small team of people. Kinda like the music video for ghost

That type of thing just gives me warm fuzzy feelings. Like if I get my ass to work practicing art I could eventually make something of comparable quality. 
_i wanna do that_
_super badly_

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f000a663687264cd730500#post_54f000a663687264cd730500
Die Young is one of those songs I can't actually hate. No matter how much I want to. And I REALLY want to hate it. But I can't. It's too goddamn catchy and too goddamn happy to hate. And yeah. The animation was super smooth and expressive. It ADDED to the song rather than resting on it or detracting from it.
